scripts.format: npm run format:server && npm run format:client
scripts.format:server: cd SeventySix.Server && dotnet build SeventySix.Analyzers.CodeFixes --configuration Release --no-incremental && dotnet build SeventySix.Analyzers --configuration Release --no-incremental && dotnet build && dotnet format analyzers --severity warn && dotnet format && dotnet format
scripts.format:client: cd SeventySix.Client && npx eslint "src/**/*.ts" --fix && npx dprint fmt && npx eslint "src/**/*.ts" --fix
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test:server: powershell -Command "if (-not (Get-Process 'Docker Desktop' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Start-Process 'C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 10 }" && cd SeventySix.Server && dotnet build && dotnet test
